Articles.Content:
Hey guys, there is something I have wanted for a very long time. This would be the ability to load two ships, rovers, rockets, launchers, ect into a single build in ksp. Mainly I would like to not have to build a new launcher when i make a rover, but once i start thinking about it I realize how many awesome things could be built if you could build them in separate parts. If someone could make a mod/plugin/3rd party program that would preform this (or inform me if there is already a way) that would be ASMAZZZING. thx for reading. (and sry if i broke any rules because this is my first post and i know forums usually have there own set of unique rules)

:sealed::huh:

This may or may not ( i am too lazy to check) be on the do not suggest list.

However it is something i really agree with as mods have done this perfectly, why cant squad give us it? If they asked ncely i think they could get the code for free too, no extra work...
If there is anyway i can help make this happen tell me and thx for replying

This idea has been proposed many times, and indeed is on the do not suggest list. Make sure to read your stickies before posting.

Also, you can do that through the Subassembly Manager plugin. This will let you save different subassemblies of rockets or other things and load them while editing another craft

However, as I said, it is on the do not suggest list, so thread closed.
